ygData.subject: Re: wiz board?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... really good ones. Anyone know a good wizard message board? ... My top 3 EQ sites are Casters Realm for spell info and news, Allakhazam for quests and item
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., Dan W <dpbh2h@y...> wrote:
>
> There are some really bad msg boards out there and there are some
really good ones. Anyone know a good wizard message board?
>

My top 3 EQ sites are Casters Realm for spell info and news,
Allakhazam for quests and item info and Everlore for the pictures and
news. And they all have link pages so you can find more specialized
sites. And they all have forums you can post to, though on
Allakhazam you'll need to be a premium member for some of them.

Tuldayen Grimblade
35th season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule
